trans-unit.source: An activity used to explicitly invoke the compensation handler of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: 用於明確叫用 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity" /> 補償處理常式的活動。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" />，其中包含此 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> 活動的 <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Activities.InArgument`1" /> that contains the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken" /> for this <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate" />.

When the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate.Target%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activity explicitly invokes the compensation handler of <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>, which returns the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken>.
trans-unit.target: 當指定 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate.Target%2A> 的 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> 時，<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> 活動會明確叫用傳回 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> 的 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> 補償處理常式。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate.Target%2A> of the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> is not specified, the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> activity invokes the default compensation for any child <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> activities in the reverse order of successful completion.
trans-unit.target: 當未指定 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate.Target%2A> 的 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensationToken> 時，<xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate> 活動會以成功完成的反向順序來叫用任何 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> 子活動的預設補償。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown if the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate.Target%2A> refers to a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity> that was previously confirmed or compensated.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> 參考先前已確認或補償的 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Compensate.Target%2A> 時，就會擲回 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.CompensableActivity>。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 在執行階段時，這個屬性是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果在執行階段設定值，則會引發 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。
